title: Micahâ€™s Idols
summary: Judges 17 introduces Micah, a man who makes idols and appoints his own priest. This marks the beginning of religious corruption, as Israel does what is right in their own eyes without a king.

faq.question: What did Micah do that was wrong?
faq.answer: He made idols and created a personal shrine, violating God's commandments.

faq.question: Who did Micah make his priest?
faq.answer: First his son, then a wandering Levite.
